list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the forming of a theory or conjecture without firm evidence.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there has been widespread speculation that he plans to quit
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đã có suy đoán rộng rãi rằng anh ta có kế hoạch bỏ thuốc lá

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: investment in stocks, property, or other ventures in the hope of gain but with the risk of loss.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the company's move into property speculation
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Công ty di chuyển vào đầu cơ tài sản
